markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dero Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2902)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dero stalkers explore the surface world by night, seeking out victims to abduct. While hiding from the burning light of day, stalkers often assist with magisters' experiments.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Dero_Stalker.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Dero Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2902)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Dero" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=749" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), [cytillesh toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59) (see sidebar), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (2 doses), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

**Immunities**
[confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63)

**Vulnerable to Sunlight** A dero stalker takes 4 damage for every hour they're exposed to sunlight.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +8,
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +10 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +10 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus lethargy poison

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 17
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)

**Dero Medicine** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The dero is wearing a cytillesh toolkit and has a hand free; **Effect** The dero excises damaged flesh and crudely stitches wounds shut, healing themself or an ally in reach for 2d8 Hit Points. For 1 hour, the target has slashing weakness 2 and is immune to Dero Medicine.

**Exploit Lethargy**   A creature afflicted with [lethargy poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2902) is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the dero stalker, and the stalker can choose to add the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) trait to their attacks against the creature without taking the normal penalty.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A dero stalker deals 1d6 extra precision damage to creatures who are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-388" />
name: Dero Stalker
